game.name: Highway Noir
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You are an underground driver for hire, fired from the Major Crimes Agency. Rush through a busy city at night as you take on high speed getaways, dangerous street races, white knuckle pursuits and more. Don't stop until you reveal the truth about who wanted you gone
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are an underground driver for hire, fired from the Major Crimes Agency. Rush through a busy city at night as you take on high speed getaways, dangerous street races, white knuckle pursuits and more. Don't stop until you reveal the truth about who wanted you gone
